--- Robert Riley <chiyohakuryuu@...> wrote:

> Malice:
> 
> His face resumed its normal appearance and his grin dropped to a
> scowl.  He had almost drained the field of its operational power.
> 
> "You'd believe any lie I could tell you.  Explains why you're just a
> follower!"

Myrmidon said nothing, the level of respect he had for Malice had
drained away. He had thought originally that perhaps they had brought a
new change, perhaps a road to honor and glory, a more aggressive stance
for Predacons and Decepticons, but instead he could see from Malice
that they were only frenzied fighters with nothing else to add. 

> He modified and discharged the energy he had drained back into the
> barrier to overload it and force it down.  He stepped through the
> doorway and looked Myrmidon straight in the optic.
> 
> "Get out of my way, follower. I have to go do the job you fools
> refuse to do."

Myrmidon didn't move, his response was simple and direct! His motar
cannons were already primed and ready, so as soon as the shielding
dropped he opened fire, any words Malice had to say fell on deaf audio
receptors as the doorway where Malice stood was filled with Myrmidon's
explosive fury!


Preston
(Myrmidon)
